entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:55 a.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
